main event: Several witnesses reported a brilliant yellow object traveling from west to east, which disappeared as it turned south on June 24, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as brilliant and yellow in color., Witnesses reported that the object emitted a bright light and exhibited high speeds., The sightings lasted between 3 to 5 minutes., The object seemed to slow down abruptly before disappearing., Multiple sources corroborated the sighting, reinforcing its credibility.
sighted object: a brilliant yellow object in the sky
witness description: Various observers including commercial airline pilots and military personnel.
